name: A-Train
description: A-Train is a hybrid between Mazar I Sharif and the clone-only Arcata e-32 Trainwreck.  This hybrid gives you the classic stoned feeling.  Be ready for smiles and munchies when you jump on the A-Train.
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Giggly, Creative, Uplifted, Stress, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Pain, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Anxious
